Line 7: Line 7:
Many BitTorrent websites act as both tracker and index. Sites such as these publicize the tracker's URL and allow users to [[upload]] torrents to the index with the tracker's URL embedded in them, providing all the features necessary to initiate a download.
Many BitTorrent websites act as both tracker and index. Sites such as these publicize the tracker's URL and allow users to [[upload]] torrents to the index with the tracker's URL embedded in them, providing all the features necessary to initiate a download.

==Open Trackers==
+
=== Open Trackers ===
Open BitTorrent trackers are not abundant, mainly due to legal issues and costs of running the servers, however, they do exist. The most populat open/public tracker is [[ThePirateBay]], others, like [[OpenBitTorrent]] and PublicBitTorrent <ref>http://publicbt.com/</ref> are still somewhat recent.
Open BitTorrent trackers are not abundant, mainly due to legal issues and costs of running the servers, however, they do exist. The most populat open/public tracker is [[ThePirateBay]], others, like [[OpenBitTorrent]] and PublicBitTorrent <ref>http://publicbt.com/</ref> are still somewhat recent.
